product_overview: Rupantar AI Admin Panel is a comprehensive management system designed to give administrators full control over the Rupantar AI platform. It includes user, creator, template, content moderation, wallet & transactions, AI model configuration, system settings, reporting, and support ticket management, enabling streamlined operations, robust moderation, financial oversight, and detailed analytics.
core_goals: Provide administrators with a real-time dashboard overview of platform health, user activity, and revenue.
Manage user accounts including filtering, editing, banning, and bulk actions efficiently.
Oversee creator applications, approvals, income, and withdrawals with an intuitive interface.
Control template approvals, categorization, performance analytics, and enforce quality through automated and manual moderation.
Implement robust content moderation using AI and manual review to maintain community standards.
Handle user payments, promo codes, refunds, and creator payouts ensuring secure transactions and compliance.
Configure and monitor AI generation models to optimize cost, performance, and safety.
Enable role-based admin management with detailed permission controls and secure authentication.
Deliver comprehensive reports and analytics covering user, generation, revenue, creator, moderation, and support metrics.
Support users and creators via a ticketing system with prioritized issue handling and canned responses.
key_features: Admin Dashboard with real-time stats cards for users, generations, revenue, templates, quick actions, activity feed, system health, charts, and notifications center.
User Management with advanced filtering, sorting, detailed user profiles, bulk actions, and transaction and activity history.
Creator Management including pending applications review, detailed profiles, earnings tracking, withdrawal requests, and verification management.
Template Management featuring status-based views, AI-powered auto quality checks, manual review workflows, categorization, featured/trending management, and analytics.
Content Moderation with auto-flagging, manual review queues, banned keyword management, strike system, appeals handling, and moderation logs.
Wallet & Transactions systems supporting multi-gateway payment setup, promo codes, auto points credit, refunds, creator earnings and withdrawals, and financial analytics.
AI Configuration & Management with multi-model selection, API key management, cost settings, performance monitoring, and detailed analytics.
Admin & System Settings including admin user roles, two-factor authentication, system configurations, branding, email, notifications, storage, security policies, and compliance.
Reports & Analytics with customizable dashboards, detailed reports on all platform aspects, export options, and scheduled reporting.
Support & Tickets system for managing user inquiries, prioritization, canned responses, analytics, and customer satisfaction tracking.
user_flow_summary: Admin logs in via secure admin URL with email, password, and 2FA.
Admin accesses the dashboard for an overview of system health and activity.
Admin manages users: search, filter, edit profiles, adjust points, ban or suspend, view histories, and perform bulk operations.
Admin reviews pending creator applications with detailed applicant info and auto quality checks; approves or rejects with feedback.
Admin manages creator profiles and earnings; processes withdrawal requests with bank verification.
Admin reviews and moderates templates: approve, reject, flag, categorize, and track analytics.
Admin handles content moderation queues for flagged content and user reports; issues strikes, bans, or approvals.
Admin configures payment gateways and promotional codes; monitors transaction history and processes refunds.
Admin manages AI models: tests APIs, sets active models, monitors performance and costs.
Admin manages sub-admin roles, system settings, branding, email configs, notifications, security policies, backups, and compliance.
Admin generates, exports, and schedules multiple types of reports.
Admin manages support tickets: assigns, replies, escalates, closes, and analyzes performance.
validation_criteria: Admin dashboard displays accurate real-time data and updates every 30 seconds.
User management filters, searches, sorts, and actions function correctly including bulk operations.
Creator application review workflow correctly enforces approval/rejection criteria and sends notifications.
Template management enforces AI quality checks, moderation flags, and status transitions reliably.
Content moderation triggers auto and manual actions per rule sets and logs all actions.
Payment gateways process transactions securely and reflect correctly on user accounts with promo codes applied.
Creator withdrawal requests are properly verified, processed, and communicated.
AI model configuration changes impact generation as expected, with performance metrics accurately reported.
Admin user role permissions strictly enforce access controls and two-factor authentication.
Reports generate accurate metrics, export correctly, and respect filters and date ranges.
Support ticket system manages tickets with correct statuses, assignments, responses, and satisfaction tracking.
Security features enforce password policies, IP restrictions, session timeouts, and audit logs consistently.
